casepack.title: UMCP End-to-End Reference CasePack - Complete Audit Trail
casepack.description: Complete, minimal, end-to-end reference CasePack demonstrating full UMCP audit trail with contract freeze, Tier-1 kernel computation, typed boundaries, OOR handling, and cryptographic manifest.

run_intent.notes: Full pipeline execution with OOR events (t=3), typed boundaries (Ï„_R=INF_REC), and regime classification. Demonstrates clip_and_flag policy and no-credit rule for non-return.
